name: The Geekonaut
body:
### Hello world
Welcome to my web hub. I am [AVGP](https://twitter.com/avgp).
I [write a blog](http://ox86.tumblr.com) and I'm a generic computer geek:

-----BEGIN GEEK CODE BLOCK-----  
Version: 3.1  
GCS d-(+)@ s+: a-- C+++$ UBL+++$ P+@ L++++$ !E W+++$ !N !o !K-- !w !O M-$ !V PS+ PE Y+ PGP !t !5 X+ R tv+ b++ DI D+ G+ e+ h- r++ y+   
------END GEEK CODE BLOCK------

### What you can find here
Below you can get a bunch of videos of me talking about stuff, lots of slide decks I used while talking about stuff and a bunch of links to different projects I'm fiddling with.
